name: wiper
description:
Use left/right keys to move the wipers back and forth to keep your windshield stable. The closer you are to the beat of the song, the closer together the image will stay.

Inspired in part by things I read in Alexander R. Galloway's Gaming: Essays on Algorithmic Culture and Jack Halberstam's The Queer Art of Failure.

I don't own the music; the songs are "Teen Line" by The Shivvers, "Mystery" by Wipers, and "What Do You Want Me To Do?" by Pointed Sticks.

Made in Processing 3, and requires Java.
